entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow before morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
